name: Super DynoStory (itch)
description:
Based loosely on the original "DynoStory"...

Super DynoStory is a silly remake of the classic metroidvania but with silly cut scenes that force you to think outside the box.The EVIL Pallid has stolen your gold! Shoot, Jet Pack and Chicken? your way across hundreds of interconnected rooms to stop his evil plan and get revenge.Battle 6 Peculiar Bosses, Spoilers: It's Megasluggy, Pooch the Furry, Levaduck, Princess Obly, Evil Satan Santa and Pallid himself, The villainous spook.Get Achievements for speed-running the game in 30 minutes, beating the game with only 2 max health or killing "Mr Falco" at the office. Every download of Super DynoStory includes...
  • 150+ DIFFERENT ROOMS
  • 30+ SILLY CUT SCENES
  • SNAKES
  • 12 CHALLENGING ACHIEVEMENTS
  • 6 PECULIAR BOSSES
  • 5 POWER UPS
  • 3 VOICE ACTORS
  • 2 DIFFICULTY MODES
  • AND A PARTRIDGE IN A PEAR TR- I mean... 1 EPIC GAME
Check out the cast of the game!

DynoStorm: http://dynostorm.media/

PallidCrest: https://www.youtube.com/user/PallidCrest

YoloswagStudios: https://twitter.com/yoloswagstudios

Download the Super DynoStory Soundtrack!

REMIXED SOUNDTRACK (in-game version) : https://dynostorm.bandcamp.com/album/super-dynostory-the-remixed-soundtrack

ORIGINAL / LEGACY SOUNDTRACK (pre-beta version) : https://dynostorm.bandcamp.com/album/super-dynostory-legacy-album-the-original-soundtrack
